blogPost.excerpt: Bold is a hosted, headless CMS SaaS application that empowers publishers to create, curate and distribute their content across modern devices and screens effortlessly through structured APIs using any technology stack.
blogPost.body: Bold is a hosted, headless CMS SaaS application that empowers publishers to create, curate and distribute their content across modern devices and screens effortlessly through structured APIs using any technology stack.
blogPost.title: Bold CMS - The CMS that understands your content
blogPost.author: Quintype

localize.description: Bold是一个托管的无头CMS SaaS应用程序，它使出版商能够使用任何技术栈，通过结构化的API在现代设备和屏幕上毫不费力地创建、策划和发布他们的内容。
Bold是一個託管的無頭CMS SaaS應用程序，它使出版商能夠使用任何技術棧，通過結構化的API在現代設備和屏幕上毫不費力地創建、策劃和發佈他們的內容。

previous.excerpt: ManyPixels is an on-demand & tech-enabled design service that is fast, affordable & easy-to-use. 1,500 startups and SMBs have used ManyPixels for their graphic and web design projects. Submit your design request today. Get it back tomorrow. Easy as that!
previous.title: ManyPixels 2.0 - Your virtual, on-demand graphic design team!

localize.description: ManyPixels是一个按需和科技化的设计服务，它快速、实惠、易于使用。1,500家初创企业和中小企业已经使用ManyPixels进行平面和网页设计项目。今天提交您的设计要求。明天就能得到回复。就这么简单
localize.tagline: 您的虚拟、按需的平面设计团队!

localize.description: ManyPixels是一個按需和科技化的設計服務，它快速、實惠、易於使用。1,500家初創企業和中小企業已經使用ManyPixels進行平面和網頁設計項目。今天提交您的設計要求。明天就能得到回覆。就這麼簡單
localize.tagline: 您的虛擬、按需的平面設計團隊!

next.excerpt: The Logbook makes journaling easier than ever, you don't have to log how are you feeling every day to know more about yourself, the Logbook makes it easy to track goals and moments that contributed to them, through a secure and private experience.
next.title: Logbook - Your personal space to reflect on experiences and emotions.

localize.description: Das Logbuch macht das Führen eines Journals einfacher als je zuvor. Sie müssen nicht jeden Tag protokollieren, wie Sie sich fühlen, um mehr über sich selbst zu erfahren, das Logbuch macht es einfach, Ziele und Momente, die zu ihnen beigetragen haben, über eine sichere und private Erfahrung zu verfolgen.
localize.tagline: 你反思经验和情感的个人空间。

localize.description: Das Logbuch macht das Führen eines Journals einfacher als je zuvor.
